ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: My answers: When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the week to play:  Any day of the week or weekend Time of day: Late evenings after
ygData.messageBody:
My answers:


When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: Any day of the week or weekend

Time of day: Late evenings after the kids are in bed

Longest stretch of continuous play: 4 hours on my Bards

Way to have game sounds: Three-speaker set or headphones, prefer headphones
since my card
does 3-D to them.

Distance to sit from display: A couple of feet.

TV show to have on: None.

Music to listen to: Usually Classical, rarely pop rock

Beverage (non-alcoholic): milk

Beverage (alcoholic): milk with frangelico (rare weekends only)

Health Food: salad

Junk Food: chocolate chip cookies

Clothes to wear: flannel nightgown


If you get the picture of a greying middle-aged woman sitting in a
concealing flannel nighty, eating cookies and milk for a late night snack
while her family is all abed and playing EQ ... well ..

there ya go. (permission to ROFL granted).

Starling on Erollisi (blonde woodelf OMG!)
Melodie on Brell (blonde human)
